questionTitle: Mary has had her father ...................... her a thorny problem.
Before .............. to bed, remember to turn off the lights.
Daisy will have her bicycle .......................... tomorrow.
We prefer music .............. film.

Which of those girls is the ..............?
In spite of the hot weather, the little boy refused ............ off his coat.
She was amazed ...................... about that.
He was on his ................. to London.
This is .............. beautiful park in the city.
I like Dalat. What I like ................. living here is that it's fresh, quiet and beautiful.
